channel.title: Jascha Wedowski's Programming Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Jascha Wedowski's Programming Portfolio

item.title: Yet another renderer: Locust
item.description: Another one of those projects that every engine/graphics programming enthusiast has probably filled entire hard drives with…

item.title: First Person Shooter Techdemo
item.description: Another attempt at making something with actual gameplay…

item.title: Skeletal Animation Playground
item.description: Writing fancy rendering pipelines is fun, but looking at completely static scenes becomes a bit dull after a while…

item.title: Game Programming Lab Project: GPP
item.description: This project was part of my Bachelors degree in Computer Science. Originally intended as a small game project…

item.title: Brush Level Editor
item.description: An important part of any engine are the world building tools…

item.title: D3D12 Renderer
item.description: No better way to learn a new graphics API than to use it!
